Text: Glenwood Canyon is a rugged scenic 12.5 mi canyon on the Colorado River in western Colorado in the United States.
Triplets:<Glenwood Canyon
1:
--------------------
Text: Glenwood Canyon:  Its walls climb as high as 1300 ft above the Colorado River.
Triplets:<Glenwood Canyon
2:
--------------------
Text: Glenwood Canyon:  It is the largest such canyon on the Upper Colorado.
Triplets:<Glenwood Canyon
4:
--------------------
Text: Glenwood Canyon:  The canyon stretches from near Dotsero, where the Colorado receives the Eagle River, downstream in a west-southwest direction to just east of Glenwood Springs, on the mouth of the Roaring Fork.
Triplets:<Glenwood Canyon
